channel.title: CVE Feed for eteubert -- Podlove Podcast Publisher
channel.description: The latest CVEs for eteubert -- Podlove Podcast Publisher

item.title: CVE-2024-1110|2024-02-07T11:02:38.853Z -- eteubert -- Podlove Podcast Publisher
item.description: The Podlove Podcast Publisher plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the init() function in all versions up to, and including, 4.0.11. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to import the plugin's settings.

item.title: CVE-2024-1109|2024-02-07T11:02:39.482Z -- eteubert -- Podlove Podcast Publisher
item.description: The Podlove Podcast Publisher plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the init_download() and init() functions in all versions up to, and including, 4.0.11. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to export the plugin's tracking data and podcast information.
